info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Caldwell County through 300 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Blowing Rock, or 6 miles southeast of Blowing Rock In Caldwell County, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blowing Rock In Caldwell County, Cedar Rock, Patterson, Kings Creek and Upton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
